page.title: 05RANSKILL WALK (EAST)
page.content: We walked just over the bridge down Mattersey Road,when on our right we came to Bridge House,which is now deserted,next to the railway.Also,on the same side as Bridge House it is quite unusual in that there is some livestock(sheep.)When we look across the road to the other side we see some cereal crop(either wheat or barley.) Next to the crop field is another cereal-crop field,but this time ,there are poppies in the field,this suggests that the farmer did not use as much spray on the crops.On the same side, next to another field of poppies is an ex-gravel pit,an old quarry,but now it is reclaimed land and it has been filled with water.Then on the right near the gates of Tarmac(a concrete and cement company)was a dead grassnake.In the Tarmac grounds there is only 1 duck left!Continued on P15{
